synopsis the zohar discusses the
primordial phase that ignited the
process of creation
this phase produced a vacated space
a void into which our physical universe
would eventually be born
by this act of creation the infinite
gave birth to the finite
just as the seed contains all the stages
that will produce a full grown tree
including the final fruit the seed of
our cosmos contains all the souls of
mankind
including our complete and final
fulfillment
recognizing this motivates us to
complete our own spiritual work
it accelerates our spiritual
transformation by revealing our
connections with the seed
which is the cause of all causes

created
